title: Being Determined to Enjoy Your Life | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Being Determined to Enjoy Your Life | Joel Osteen
description:
Everyday is a gift from God. When we live life with a grateful attitude, we are bringing glory to God.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
